full_summary:
### Janitorial Services for RCMP Carlyle Detachment

#### Overview
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified service providers to submit bids for janitorial services at the RCMP Carlyle Detachment in Carlyle, Saskatchewan. The contract period will be for two years with an optional three-year extension.

#### Tender Details

*   Tender Number:t  M5000-21-1625/A
*   Closing Date: 2024-02-28T15:00:00
*   Contracting Authority: RCMP Carlyle Detachment
*   Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding

#### Description of Services
The successful bidder will provide all necessary labour, materials, equipment, transportation, and daily site supervision to maintain a clean and healthy environment at the detachment. Cleaning services will be required five days a week.

#### Evaluation Criteria

Interested bidders must submit their proposals in accordance with the Invitation to Tender (ITT). Responses will be evaluated based on lowest price, and suppliers will be selected accordingly. Selected bidders will be awarded a contract to provide the specified services.

#### Security Requirements
This procurement requires a security requirement. Suppliers must ensure they have the necessary clearance to access the detachment.

#### Terms and Conditions
Canada retains its right to negotiate with any supplier on this procurement. Suppliers may submit their documents in either official language of Canada.

#### Documentation

*   Tender notice document ([English](./eng-link) | [French](./fr-link))
*   Invitation to Tender (ITT) document ([English](./eng-link) | [French](./fr-link))

All inquiries must be directed to:

Debbie McPherson
Contact Information:
*   Phone: 16396253567
*   Email: Debbie.McPherson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
